snippet.title: Crisis in the Kremlin: The Cold War | English Trailer
snippet.description:
TRY THE FREE DEMO NOW: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1922740
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1922740
Official website: https://nostal.games


Take charge of the Soviet Union in the new and updated Crisis in the Kremlin. Lead the country through its most challenging period. Carry out scientific research, manage your finances, and state spending to lead the USSR out of a prolonged political crisis. Implement public reforms, introduce free elections or, conversely, roll back any liberal missteps: the fine-tuning of legislation is in your hands. Make friends in the West, or strike at its heart in a direct confrontation with the U.S. and NATO. Turn inward and shun the outside world, follow the path of neo-imperialism, or cut out any path you can imagine in Crisis in the Kremlin: The Cold War.
